title: ITSA Welcome & Semester 1 Kick-off
message: Join the ITSA welcome session and tool walk-through for Honours modules (CSIS6813, CSII6833, CSID6853, CSII6813, CSIP6853, CSIP6833, CSIA6813, EFMN6814).

title: Portal Rollout Complete
message: Semester 1 features (Schedules, Repository, FAQ) are live. Please report issues via Help → Support.

title: FAQ: Module vs Repository Files
message: New article explains the difference between Module Documents and the global Repository, with examples from CSIP6833 and CSIA6813.

title: Templates: Research & Coding Standards
message: Added Honours research report template and coding style guides relevant to CSIP6853, CSIP6833, and CSII6813.

title: Hackathon: Data & Mobile Apps
message: Weekend hackathon focusing on datasets (CSIA6813) and Android builds (CSIP6853). Teams of 3–5; prizes for best HCI (CSII6833) design.

title: Planned Maintenance
message: Portal maintenance on Feb 8, 21:00–22:30. Schedules and Repository may be intermittent.

title: FAQ: Booking Labs & After-Hours Access
message: Step-by-step guide for lab policies and after-hours requests, with examples for CSIP6853 mobile builds.

title: Past Exam Packs Uploaded
message: HCI patterns (CSII6833) and Information Security case studies (CSII6813) exam packs now available.

title: Android Dev Clinics (CSIP6853)
message: Weekly drop-in for Gradle woes, emulator issues, and Compose basics. Bring your laptop.

title: Advanced Internet Programming Code Review (CSIP6833)
message: Peer review on API design, error handling, and auth flows before your first sprint demo.

title: Career Expo: Software, Data & FinTech
message: Meet employers hiring for roles aligned to CSIA6813 (Data) and CSIP6833/CSIP6853 (Full-stack/Mobile).

title: Git & Team Workflows Workshop
message: Hands-on session covering PR etiquette, code reviews, and trunk-based development for team projects.

title: Data Science Reading Group (CSIA6813)
message: We’ll discuss recent papers on feature stores and model monitoring; sign up on the portal.

title: EFMN6814: Finance for Tech Leads
message: Short talk on budgeting and cost awareness for project proposals tied to EFMN6814 concepts.

title: Department Hackathon: Full-Stack + Data
message: 24-hour build sprint; best use of HCI patterns (CSII6833) and clean API design (CSIP6833) gets prizes.

title: Exam Prep: Security & Warehousing
message: Group Q&A for CSII6813 (crypto, auth) and CSID6853 (ETL, dimensional design).

title: Consultation Week Sign-ups
message: Book consultation slots with lecturers for CSIS6813 proposals, mobile build reviews, and AIP debugging.

title: Lab Etiquette & After-Hours Access
message: Reminder on lab policies during project crunch weeks; request after-hours access via the portal.
